verses.text: His \w foundation|strong="H3248"\w* \add is\add* in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2042"\w*.\f + \fr 87.1 \ft for the sons: or, of the sons\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* more than all the \w dwellings|strong="H4908"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.
Glorious \w things|strong="H3513"\w* are \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* of thee, O \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

I will make \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* of \w Rahab|strong="H7294"\w* and \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* to them that \w know|strong="H3045"\w* me: behold \w Philistia|strong="H6429"\w*, and \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*, with \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w*; this \add man\add* was \w born|strong="H3205"\w* there.

And of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* it shall be \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, This and that \w man|strong="H0376"\w* was \w born|strong="H3205"\w* in her: and the \w highest|strong="H5945"\w* himself shall \w establish|strong="H3559"\w* her.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w count|strong="H5608"\w*, when he writeth \w up|strong="H3789"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add that\add* this \add man\add* was \w born|strong="H3205"\w* there. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.
As well the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* as the \w players|strong="H2490"\w* on instruments \add shall be there:\add* all my \w springs|strong="H4599"\w* \add are\add* in thee.
